Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 23rd overall pick, by Houston in 1965...
Injured on 6/25/1966 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/7/1967, off Jim Maloney (CIN)...
Earned first career win on 4/7/1967...
Hit first career homerun on 9/10/1967, off Cecil Butler (ATL)...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Los Angeles on 10/2/1968, striking out 2...
Traded from Houston to Detroit on 6/9/1969 (Going to HOU: RF K. Griffey Sr., P C. Vaughan. Going to DET: P S. Bahnsen)...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/10/1970 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/11/1976 to a 1-year deal worth $630,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/10/1977 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/21/1979 to a 4-year deal worth $2,560,000 per year...
Injured on 9/29/1979 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from Cleveland to Texas on 7/31/1981 (Going to TEX: 2B C. Walker, P E. Vande Berg, P S. Bahnsen, P G. Zahn. Going to CLE: CF L. Hisle, 3B K. Oberkfell)...
Injured on 9/2/1981 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Houston in 1987...
Injured on 5/1/1987 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 7/7/1989 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 5/28/1990 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Injured on 6/3/1990 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 8/24/1990 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/3/1991...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1994, going 5-1, 1.54...
Won World Series with Houston in 1994...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Houston in 1995...
Injured on 7/9/1996 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 6 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1997, going 6-0, 0.66...
Was selected to the 1997 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1997, winning 2 games with a 0.55 ERA...
Won Cy Young Award in 1997, going 30-5, 2.34 ERA...
Was selected to the 1998 Allstar game...
